name: Balanced Multi-Asset Report
description: For diversified multi-asset portfolios with moderate volatility, balanced allocation across equities, fixed income, and alternatives. General-purpose template suitable when neither equity-growth nor stable-income templates match.

sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.commentary_template: The {fund_name} generated an annualized return of {annualized_return_pct}% with {annualized_vol_pct}% volatility over {n_months} months, producing a Sharpe ratio of {sharpe_ratio}. The portfolio is diversified across {n_asset_classes} asset classes with {pct_positive_months}% of months delivering positive returns.

sections.title: Performance Overview
sections.commentary_template: Cumulative portfolio return of {portfolio_total_return_pct}% compares to the benchmark's {benchmark_total_return_pct}%, representing {excess_return_pct} percentage points of excess return over the period.

sections.title: Asset Allocation
sections.commentary_template: The portfolio's allocation evolved over the period, with the largest shift in {largest_shift_name} ({largest_shift_magnitude} percentage points). {largest_allocation_name} remains the dominant allocation at {largest_allocation_pct}%.

sections.title: Current Portfolio Mix
sections.commentary_template: The current allocation reflects a {allocation_style} positioning across {n_asset_classes} asset classes, balancing growth potential with risk management.

sections.title: Return Distribution
sections.commentary_template: Monthly returns ranged from {min_return_pct}% to {max_return_pct}% with skewness of {skewness} and kurtosis of {kurtosis}. The mean monthly return of {mean_monthly_pct}% is consistent with the fund's balanced mandate.

sections.title: Risk Assessment
sections.commentary_template: The risk profile shows {max_risk_category} as the highest-rated factor at {max_risk_score}/10, with an average score of {avg_risk_score}/10 across all dimensions. The {score_range}-point range between highest and lowest scores indicates a {risk_balance_assessment} risk distribution.

sections.title: Top Holdings
sections.commentary_template: The portfolio's {n_holdings} holdings span multiple asset classes, with the top position representing {top_holding_weight_pct}% and top-3 concentration at {top_3_concentration_pct}%.

sections.title: Outlook
sections.commentary_template: The fund's diversified positioning provides resilience across market scenarios. The strategic allocation balances growth opportunities with defensive positioning, appropriate for investors seeking moderate risk-adjusted returns.
